on_redraw.docs:
**, [Automation](https://esphome.io/automations/index.html#automation)**: An automation to perform when the menu needs to be redrawn. This can be useful if your display has slow refresh rates. For example E-Ink displays that are used with `display_interval: never`.

*See also: [Graphical Display Menu](https://esphome.io/components/display_menu/graphical_display_menu.html#overview)*
